content: “cinder” [ashes] renders better what Derrida meant by trace, remaining w/out remaining, cinder is not!, testifies w/out testifying, destruction of memory itself, absolute radical forgetting: absolute non-memory communicates w/ gift—not seeking to be recognized or saved; incineration as elementary form of experience
